description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Slay monsters and cast spells with your Avatar!  Create and share worlds over Xbox LIVE with the RPG Builder.  Features:  10+ hour adventure, 6 player LIVE multiplayer, unlockable titles, global highscores, multiplayer map builder and sharing, and much more!  Save the world with your Avatar today!  Avatar Legends is for gamers of all ages and skill levels.  Limited Time only 240msp.
